experimentationSpace: Digital Twin Experimentation Space at Uniandes.
leveraging: Leveraging the potential of various mixed reality platforms
objectivesDesc: Colivri Digital Twin is created with several objectives in mind:

objectivesList.experiment: Experiment on GD: Create useful functionality for laboratories at Uniandes.
objectivesList.groupWork: Group work support: With the support of the Dept., generate an infrastructure for the development of group degree projects.
objectivesList.timeline: Timeline of work: Create an open platform that can be extensible over time.

quickControlDesc: From a large format control panel, you can have a quick view of everything that is happening in the laboratory
arInfo: AR - add information to the real world
arInfoDesc: In Augmented Reality, being able to see additional information about the equipment in front.

listFeatures.moreInfoPoints: See the points that have more information
listFeatures.userInfo: See information from other users, historical and in real time
listFeatures.environmentalInfo: See dynamic environmental information (Position of chairs)
